name: Unruly King: Let's save a princess! Prototype
name_original: Unruly King: Let's save a princess! Prototype
description:
Maya leaves her home and life as a lowly baker in search of a greater destiny.

Made for the Turn Based Jam

This game is a prototype. The full game is planned to have a total of five levels and more dynamic battle system with special abilities. Also cuter sprites with more expressions and clean bgs.

Music credits:

"Mighty Like Us" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
